title: How to Discourage Bullying Birds in an Australian Garden

steps.headline: Keep less open, grassed areas in your garden.
steps.description: This type of open environment tends to encourage the bigger birds.

steps.headline: Create a garden with dense plants.
steps.description: The creation of denser foliage and the reduction of the grassed areas will create a safe haven for the smaller birds.

steps.headline: Grow thickets.
steps.description: Thickets are ideal hiding places and homes for smaller birds.

steps.headline: Experiment with thick rows of shrubs rather than just having one or two here and there.
Create at least one corner of small bird sanctuary in your garden.
